name: dashboardWebinars
description:
List all the live or past webinars from a specified period of time.

**Scopes:** `dashboard_webinars:read:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Resource-intensive`
**Prerequisites:**
* Business, Education or API Plan with Webinar add-on.

from.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range defined by the "from" and "to" parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

$ul: **from**: Start date for this report in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format.
**to**: End date for this report in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format.

**next_page_token**: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.
**page_count**: The number of pages returned for the request made.
**page_size**: The number of records returned within a single API call. (default: 30)
**total_records**: The number of all records available across pages.
